record.dc:title: 25HA3 Hixon Mound Site 1HA3, Hamilton Co., TN. Feature 4, Midden pit in habitation level to north of mound 1HA3. Sq. 33L11. Direction northeast.
record.wpa:narrative: Area of dark soil containing shell, broken animal bone, sherds, rocks, charcoal. Somewhat smaller in extent than Feature 2. Possibly best described as a midden. Like Feature 2 appears to be a deeper deposit of occupational refuse than an ordinary humus line. Concentration of refuse in such places seems to justify the assertion that they are midden piles. See ground plan. Also descriptive notes for Feature 5.
record.wpa:comments: Institution has ground plan and descriptive notes for feature 5 on file. See also photograph 26HA3 [fhm00820].
